statements: SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Independent';
SELECT name, position FROM candidates WHERE position = 'Senator' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT candidate_id, name, past_experience FROM candidates WHERE past_experience IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Republican' OR political_affiliation = 'Democratic';
SELECT name, position, past_experience FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Libertarian' ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE position = 'Mayor' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, name, position FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Democrat' ORDER BY candidate_id ASC;
SELECT name, political_affiliation, past_experience FROM candidates WHERE position = 'Governor' AND political_affiliation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE past_experience LIKE '%senate%' OR position = 'President';
SELECT candidate_id, name, political_affiliation, position FROM candidates WHERE position = 'Senator' AND political_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Democrat';
SELECT name, past_experience FROM candidates WHERE position = 'President';
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM campaign_contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM candidates ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM campaign_contributions GROUP BY candidate_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE position = 'President';
SELECT name, political_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, position, past_experience FROM candidates ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, amount, donor_name FROM campaign_contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT name, political_affiliation, position, past_experience FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation LIKE '%Democrat%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM candidates;
SELECT candidate_id, name, political_affiliation, position FROM candidates;
SELECT candidate_id, name FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Independent';
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE position = 'President';
SELECT name, position FROM candidates ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidates LIMIT 5
SELECT name, political_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE position = 'President'
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Independent' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, past_experience FROM candidates WHERE position = 'Senator' AND political_affiliation = 'Democrat'
SELECT name, position, political_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE position = 'Governor' AND political_affiliation = 'Republican'
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Democratic';
SELECT id, name, position FROM candidates ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT name, past_experience FROM candidates WHERE position = 'Senator' AND political_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT * FROM endorsements ORDER BY endorsement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Independent';
SELECT candidate_id, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, position FROM candidates WHERE position IS NOT NULL AND political_affiliation = 'Democrat';
SELECT e.endorser_name, c.name AS candidate_name FROM endorsements e JOIN candidates c ON e.candidate_id = c.id ORDER BY endorsement_date ASC;
SELECT c.name, COUNT(d.donation_id) AS donation_count FROM candidates c LEFT JOIN donations d ON c.id = d.candidate_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY donation_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidates ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, political_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE position = 'President';
SELECT candidate_id, name, position FROM candidates WHERE political_affiliation = 'Republican' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM endorsements WHERE endorsement_date >= '2022-01-01' AND endorsement_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT candidate_id, COUNT(vote_id) AS total_votes FROM votes GROUP BY candidate_id ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidates ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT candidate_id, political_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE position = 'Senator' ORDER BY political_affiliation ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_candidates FROM candidates;
SELECT c.name, e.endorser_name FROM candidates c JOIN endorsements e ON c.candidate_id = e.candidate_id WHERE e.endorsement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT d.debate_id, d.topic, c.name AS candidate_name FROM debates d JOIN candidates c ON d.topic = c.position ORDER BY d.date_time DESC;
